FuncDef:
The cu warm-standby-mode command configures the warm backup mode for an service-location backup group.
The undo cu warm-standby-mode command enables a device to exit the warm backup mode of an service-location backup group.
By default, no warm backup mode is configured for an service-location backup group.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In CU separation mode, when N:1 warm backup coexists with distributed CGN, to configure the warm backup mode for the service-location backup group, run the cu warm-standby-mode command.
Prerequisites
The cu-agent command has been run on the device.
